attributes.action: Stop Anglesey County Council from placing double yellow lines.
attributes.background:
Anglesey County Council want to place double yellow line, removing existing parking in an already small, but busy, village. 
The double yellows will reduce parking options available to customers of local businesses, thus damaging local trade. 
The area is also a hot spot for tourists.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things that the UK Government and Parliament are responsible for. The issue that you raise is the responsibility of Anglesey County Council. You could try contacting the council directly to raise your concern. You can find the council's contact details here: http://www.anglesey.gov.uk/contact-us/
